PackageOracle.name: DA_ACCOUNT_CYCLE
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_ACCOUNT_CYCLE
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.36.441883000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,account_id IN NUMBER
,billing_cycle_id IN VARCHAR2
,account_cycle_start_dt IN DATE
,account_cycle_end_dt IN DATE
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,account_id IN NUMBER
,billing_cycle_id IN VARCHAR2
,account_cycle_start_dt IN DATE
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_account_cycle;

body.name: DA_ACCOUNT_CYCLE
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_ACCOUNT_CYCLE
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.36.452637000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,account_id IN NUMBER
,billing_cycle_id IN VARCHAR2
,account_cycle_start_dt IN DATE
,account_cycle_end_dt IN DATE
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_account_cycle.add, parms=' || account_id || '|' || billing_cycle_id || '|' || account_cycle_start_dt || '|' || account_cycle_end_dt || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_account_cycle a
(
a.account_id
,a.billing_cycle_id
,a.account_cycle_start_dt
,a.account_cycle_end_dt
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.account_id
,add.billing_cycle_id
,add.account_cycle_start_dt
,add.account_cycle_end_dt
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_account_cycle.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,account_id IN NUMBER
,billing_cycle_id IN VARCHAR2
,account_cycle_start_dt IN DATE
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_account_cycle.del, parms=' || account_id || '|' || billing_cycle_id || '|' || account_cycle_start_dt || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_account_cycle a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.account_id = del.account_id
AND a.billing_cycle_id = del.billing_cycle_id
AND a.account_cycle_start_dt = del.account_cycle_start_dt
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_account_cycle.del');

END del;

END da_account_cycle;
